title: Intentionally feeding?
body: Minions seem to run it down each lane EVERY SINGLE GAME, their whole purpose is to die and intentionally feed the enemy to provide gold, why can we not report this? If so, is there a way to report it? It's quite annoying to see members of our team running down each lane every game every few seconds ): I would please like to report minions ): I've sent a ticket to Riot Support and am now waiting for their response :l they deceive {{champion:7}}  you by pretending to be helpful but actually they're inting everyone {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Never trust a minion!

They spend all their time thinking about how best to betray their masters.
